title: Khiron: Building a Multi-Billion Dollar Cannabis Company
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Celebrating our 100th episode! Alvaro Torres, co-founder and CEO of Khiron, joins us to discuss building value in LatAm and Europe and why a strong foundation is essential. Following its recent Q3 earnings and some bullish announcements, we also cover why Khiron wanted to avoid treating cannabis as a commodity. Sustainable patient growth with good margins. Staying the course. Slow, but present, European growth; CBD skincare in Hong Kong; growth in Mexico, Colombia and beyond. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
